info.name: RosterApp API
info.description:
**RosterApp** is a lightweight, role-based rostering and clock-in/out system built with Flask (Python). This Postman collection provides a complete set of API endpoints to test and interact with the application during development or deployment.

Presented by **CodeCrunch™**

#### Base URL

- Local development: [http://localhost:8080](http://127.0.0.1:8080)
    

#### Overview

RosterApp supports two user roles:

- **Admin** – full control (create schedules, assign shifts, manage users)
    
- **Staff** – view their own roster, clock in/out, receive notifications
    

Authentication is JWT-based (Bearer token returned on successful login).
